Entries.282815609/e 282815608/D Marnie/f Marnie: jaunty/84 18/farmer 68 16 1 Marnie 84 16 0/skippable/pause 2000/move farmer 10 0 1/pause 100/emote Marnie 16/faceDirection Marnie 3/pause 1000/speak Marnie "Oh, good morning, Mr. @.$h^Oh, good morning, Ms. @.$h"/move farmer 5 0 1/speak Marnie "What brings you here so early?$h"/speak Marnie "$q -1 null#What brings you here so early?#$r -1 0 event_marnieMorning1#I was just passing through.#$r -1 0 event_marnieMorning2#I came to see you.#$r -1 0 event_marnieMorning3#Sorry, I can't talk right now. I'm in a hurry."/pause 1000/speak Marnie "I know this is kind of an awkward topic, but... I just...#$b#I want to be honest with you, Mr. @.$s^I want to be honest with you, Ms. @.$s"/faceDirection Marnie 2/pause 1500/speak Marnie "You knew that Mr. Lewis and I separated a while ago, correct?$s"/pause 2000/faceDirection Marnie 3/speak Marnie "The reason it happened was... well..."/pause 800/speak Marnie "I thought that Mr. Lewis had fallen in love with you, Mr. @.$s^I thought that Mr. Lewis had fallen in love with you, Ms. @.$s"/pause 1000/speak Marnie "You two had seemed to be getting along well lately, and Mr. Lewis seemed so distant whenever he was with me.$s"/question fork1 "#Oh... I'm sorry.#That's not true. We were never that close."/fork notThatCloseB/pause 1000/speak Marnie "...It's alright. It's in the past.$s"/pause 500/speak Marnie "But... I thought that the two of you might end up together...#$b#And I wanted to call it off before things got even more confusing.$s"/pause 500/speak Marnie "So... I wanted to ask.#$b#Were you and Mr. Lewis in love?$s"/pause 100/speak Marnie "$q -1 null#Were you and Mr. Lewis in love?#$r -1 0 event_loveLewis1#Yes, but nothing ever came of it.#$r -1 0 event_loveLewis2#Yes, but we stopped seeing each other.#$r -1 0 event_loveLewis3#Yes, and we still are.#$r -1 0 event_loveLewis4#No. We were just good friends."/pause 1500/faceDirection Marnie 1/pause 2000/faceDirection Marnie 3/pause 500/speak Marnie "Well, @... Thank you for helping me piece together the truth. I'm glad to know I wasn't entirely crazy..."/pause 1000/speak Marnie "...Really, @. Thank you. It means a lot that you're honest with me, even when it's a little awkward.#$b#I'm very glad to have you as a friend.$4"/pause 500/speak Marnie "Now... don't let me hold you up any longer. We both have work to get back to.$h"/friendship Marnie 50/end warpOut
